frozen_definition.name: NoteCleanup
frozen_definition.signal_source: App Store reviews: 'notes getting lost in the system' and 'can't find notes even when I know they exist' across multiple note-taking platforms
frozen_definition.description: Smart note organization tool that identifies duplicate, fragmented, and orphaned notes to help users clean up their digital note chaos
frozen_definition.target_user: Knowledge workers with large note collections who struggle to find information they've previously saved
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Users report notes becoming 'fragmented and scattered' with search being 'irrelevant or incomplete' as collections grow
frozen_definition.differentiation: Focus on cleanup and retrieval vs. creation, works across existing note systems rather than replacing them
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium features include unlimited note processing, advanced AI categorization, and cross-platform sync

pricing.trial_strategy: Free cleanup for up to 100 notes, premium for unlimited processing and advanced features
